benefits.name: Enhanced Unarmed Strike
benefits.trigger: when you hit with an unarmed strike and deal damage
effects: deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 + Strength modifier instead

benefits.name: Damage Rerolls
benefits.trigger: when you roll a damage die for your unarmed strike
effects: reroll a 1 on the die and use the new roll

benefits.name: Push
benefits.trigger: once per turn when you hit with an unarmed strike as part of the Attack action
effects: push the target 5 feet away from you
